距.definition: to be at a distance of ... from; to be apart from; (bound form) distance; spur (on the leg of certain birds: gamecock, pheasant etc)

距今.definition: before the present; (a long period) ago

距翅麥雞.definition: (bird species of China) river lapwing (Vanellus duvaucelii)

距離.definition: distance; CL:個|个[ge4]; to be apart from

距離產生美.definition: absence makes the heart grow fonder
